${ModID}:Angry.NAME: Angry
DESCRIPTION: Your Attacks deal #b50% more damage and you take #b50% more damage from attacks. Upon exiting this #yStance, 获得 #b3 #yVigor.

${ModID}:Serene.NAME: Serene
DESCRIPTION: 回合结束时， 获得 #yBlock equal to #b50% of your #y格挡 。 Upon exiting this #yStance, 获得 #b1 #yDexterity.
